references.reason: This paper provides a foundational definition of temporal networks, which is the basis of temporal link prediction.

references.paper_title: Continuous-time sequential recommendation with temporal graph collaborative transformer
references.reason: This paper introduces a continuous-time sequential recommendation model using temporal graph collaborative transformer, highlighting the importance of continuous-time modeling.

references.paper_title: Predicting dynamic embedding trajectory in temporal interaction networks
references.reason: This paper focuses on predicting dynamic node embeddings in temporal networks, which is a related task to temporal link prediction that considers node evolution.

references.paper_title: Inductive representation learning in temporal networks via causal anonymous walks
references.reason: This paper introduces inductive representation learning using causal anonymous walks, addressing the challenge of inductive learning in temporal networks, a key aspect of temporal link prediction.

This paper proposes provably expressive temporal graph networks, providing theoretical guarantees for the expressiveness of the model, which is relevant to the theoretical analysis in the target paper.
